boone.map

Class Function

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.map.Function
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Function.AboutEqual, Function.AtLeast, Function.AtMost, Function.CatmullRomSpline, Function.Clip, Function.Composition, Function.Exponential, Function.GreaterThan, Function.Identity, Function.LessThan, Function.NaturalSpline, Function.Scaled, Function.Sigmoid, Function.Signum, Function.SignumWithoutZero, Function.Sinus, Function.TanHyp, NeuronPotential, PostsynapticPotential, Spike

    public abstract class Function
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, Storable
    A function that generates an output value from input values.

    NOTE: - subclasses should implement a constructor without parameters, so that Functions can be instantiated by serialization.

    Version:
    $Id: Function.java 2296 2018-04-16 12:29:15Z helmut $
    Author:
    August Mayer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Function.AboutEqual
      About Equal: return 1.0 if (eqValue - range) < value < (eqValue + range).
      static class  Function.AtLeast
      At Least: return 1.0 if value >= minValue, 0.0 else.
      static class  Function.AtMost
      At Most: return 1.0 if value <= maxValue, 0.0 else.
      static class  Function.CatmullRomSpline
      Catmull-Rom Spline Activation Function.
      static class  Function.Clip
      Clip: return value if value in the given range, else the low/high range border value.
      static interface  Function.ComboFunction
      Tagging interface for functions that extend or combine other functions.
      static class  Function.Composition
      composition function, returns g(f(x)).
      static class  Function.Exponential
      Exponential: e ** (factor * value**2).
      static class  Function.GreaterThan
      Greater Than (strict): return 1.0 if value > minValue, 0.0 else.
      static class  Function.Identity
      identity function - maps input to output
      static class  Function.LessThan
      Less Than (strict): return 1.0 if value < maxValue, 0.0 else.
      static class  Function.NaturalSpline
      Natural Cubic Spline Activation Function
      static class  Function.NotImplemented
      Runtime exception to throw for something that is not implemented.
      static class  Function.Scaled
      function adding scaling factors, applied to the function result value (outside).
      static class  Function.Sigmoid
      Sigmoid: 1 / ( 1 + e ** (- value) ) First and Second Derivative are implemented.
      static class  Function.Signum
      Signum: 1 if > 0, -1 if < 0, 0 if = 0
      static class  Function.SignumWithoutZero
      Signum Without Zero: 1 if > 0, -1 else
      static class  Function.Sinus
      Sinus: sin(factor * x) Default: factor = 0.1 First and Second Derivatives are implemented.
      static interface  Function.Spline
      Spline function interface.
      static class  Function.TanHyp
      TanHyp: ( e ** value - e ** -value ) / ( e ** value + e ** -value ) First and Second Derivatives are implemented.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Function create(java.lang.String name)
        Create a function, given its name. The name is the basic class name, without packages or outer classes. Exceptions are reported using ExceptionHandler.

        TODO: handle singleton classes.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the function to create.
        Returns:
        New function object for the given class, or null.

        public abstract double map(double value)
        Map a value through the function.

        public double mapDerivative(double value)
        Map a value through the first derivative of this function.
        Throws:
        Function.NotImplemented - if not implemented (this is a RuntimeException).

      • mapSecondDerivative

        public double mapSecondDerivative(double value)
        Map a value through the second derivative of this function.
        Throws:
        Function.NotImplemented - if not implemented (this is a RuntimeException).

      • getMinValue

        public abstract double getMinValue()
        Return the smallest possible function value. If no exact value can be produced easily, this should return an estimation (lower bound).
        Returns:
        the minimum function result.

      • getMaxValue

        public abstract double getMaxValue()
        Return the largest possible function value. If no exact value can be produced easily, this should return an estimation (upper bound).
        Returns:
        the maximum function result.
